title: Farewell to one of the best and definitely the most entertaining World Cup Group Stages of all time

author: TodayIsTheDay2000
text: Denmark has to be the biggest failure at this World Cup for me, even more so than Belgium.

author: Zefyris
text: Germany was in the grup of death and at least ended on a high note. Their last two matches were not bad. I'd say Denmark and Belgium are indeed the biggest disappointment, if... we don't count Italy.

author: ShackOneille
text: It's hard to beat Belgium in that one. They lost to Egypt right before the World Cup too..

author: Daimakku1
text: As a Mexico fan... we're up there in the biggest failures as well. Couldn't even get out of the Group Stage. First time in 28 years since we didn't. Total hot garbage.

author: Bondexxo
text: Belgium have been a huge disappointment with this golden era of players they have. More so at the last World Cup. A real underachievement.

author: danhoang1
text: Qatar too, except I think we're all happy with that. No they weren't gonna win the World Cup, but they ended up being worst-performing host ever

author: danhoang1
text: Nah they were corrupt and stole a world cup

author: Jaybot25
text: The football team was corrupt or the goverment? Bit hypocritical.

author: rainedisappoint
text: Typical hillbilly ‘murican. You’re providing military equipment to Israel who are causing genocide to innocent Palestinians, you also invaded Iraq/Afghanistan and you inadvertently caused a proxy war between Russia and Ukraine. Do some retrospection on who is corrupt before you judge another country and their morals.
